title: NFL Career Success as Predicted by NFL Scouting Combine. (arXiv:2303.05774v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: The National Football League (NFL) Scouting Combine serves as a tool to evaluate the skills of prospective players and assess their readiness to play in the NFL. The development of machine learning brings new opportunities in assessing the utility of the Scouting Combine. Using machine and statistical learning, it may be possible to predict future success of prospective athletes, as well as predict which Scouting Combine tests are the most important. Results from statistical learning research have been contradicting whether the Scouting combine is a useful metric for player success. In this study, we investigate if machine learning can be used to determine matriculation and future success in the NFL. Using Scouting Combine data, we evaluate six different algorithms' ability to predict whether a potential draft pick will play a single NFL snap (matriculation). If a player is drafted, we predict how many snaps they go on to play (success). We are able to predict matriculation with 83% ac

ret.translated_title: 基于NFL搜寻组合的NFL职业成功的预测
ret.translated_abstract: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）搜寻组合作为一种评估潜在球员技能和评估他们是否准备好参加NFL的工具。机器学习的发展带来了评估搜寻组合效用的新机会。利用机器学习和统计学习，可能预测未来潜在运动员的成功，以及预测哪些搜寻组合测试最重要。统计学习研究的结果一直在矛盾，无论搜寻组合是否是球员成功的有用指标。在这项研究中，我们调查机器学习是否可以用于确定NFL的入学和未来成功。使用搜寻组合数据，我们评估了六种不同算法预测潜在选秀是否会打一场NFL比赛（入学）。如果球员被选秀，我们预测他们会打多少个球（成功）。我们能够用83％的准确率预测入学
ret.tldr: 本文使用机器学习和统计学习的方法，从NFL搜寻组合中预测未来潜在运动员的成功和哪些搜寻组合测试最重要，调查机器学习是否可以用于确定NFL的入学和未来成功。能够以83％的准确率预测入学
